    Removed the topmost modal from the stack.

push

  • push(template: TemplateResult<ResultType>, closeCallback?: Function): ModalRegistry
    • Defined in src/modal-controller.ts:67

    Add the given template to a new modal, placed on the top of the stack. An optional closeCallback function will be executed when the modal is removed from the stack.

    Parameters

    • template: TemplateResult<ResultType>
    • Optional closeCallback: Function

    Returns ModalRegistry

    A registry object that can be used to remove or replace the modal.
